pentago

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.Block

  • class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    A block in pentago game

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static Piece BLACK_PIECE
      Black piece state of block cell

      An 3 by 3 array that keeps current block state
      (package private) static Piece RED_PIECE
      White piece state of block cell

      • isInvalidMove

        boolean isInvalidMove(int cellNumber)
        Checks the validity of putting a piece in cell determined by cell number. The validity checks simply by checking emptiness of the cell.
        Parameters:
        cellNumber - cell number to check move validity
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise

      • getCellIndex

        private int[] getCellIndex(int cellNumber)
        Converts cell number to cell row and column index.
        Parameters:
        cellNumber - cell number
        Returns:
        an array with two members, 0 index indicates computed row and 1 index indicates computed column

      • isSymmetric

        boolean isSymmetric()
        Checks if the block is symmetric. A symmetric block is a block that if rotates in both clockwise and anti-clockwise directions will not change.
        Returns:
        true if the block is symmetric, false otherwise
